attributes.description: This dashboard provides insights into the credits and billing data for ESS.

0ea16e71-0cd4-4578-a0cc-8b5325fcd01bX0.label: Part of Total cost for period

attributes.description: Run rate computed from the recent consumption

params.formula:
sum(
    ess.billing.total_ecu,
    kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d'
) / (
        (
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1
)

args.name: subtract
args.text:
max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')

args.name: divide
args.text:
(
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24)

args.name: add
args.text:
(
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1

tinymathAst.name: divide
tinymathAst.text:
sum(
    ess.billing.total_ecu,
    kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d'
) / (
        (
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1
)

embeddableConfig.description: Run rate computed from the recent consumption

params.formula: last_value(ess.billing.ecu_quantity, kql='"ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true ')

filter.query: "ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true

a030c251-94c8-4632-9ff4-148cb9b947a0X0.label: Part of last_value(ess.billing.ecu_quantity, kql='"ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true ')

params.formula: last_value(ess.billing.ecu_balance, kql='"ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true ')

filter.query: "ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true

params.formula: last_value(ess.billing.ecu_quantity, kql='"ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true ')

filter.query: "ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true

cc8781b9-650d-41f8-ac20-faa4ba08aa44X0.label: Part of last_value(ess.billing.ecu_quantity, kql='"ess.billing.ecu_balance" > 0 AND NOT ess.billing.type : "credit" AND ess.billing.active : true ')

query.query: ess.billing.end >= now-1M/M AND ess.billing.ecu_balance > 0 AND @timestamp > now-24h

params.markdown:
# 🪙 Credits dashboard

Displaying this dashboard correctly requires an existing active commercial commitment with Elastic.

attributes.title: [Metrics ESS Billing] Credits dashboard
